title: Privacy Policy
intro: Melmua Inc. ("we," "our," or "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share personal information about you when you use our website and services. It also outlines your rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable laws.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.description: We collect the following types of personal information:

items.title: Account Information
items.description: Name, email address, and account preferences when you register.

items.title: Usage Data
items.description: Information about your interactions with our services, such as typing performance and progress.

items.title: Technical Data
items.description: Device information, IP address, and browser type.

items.title: Service Provision
items.description: Provide, maintain, and improve our services.

items.title: Communication
items.description: Communicate with you about your account, updates, and marketing (if you've opted in).

sections.title: Sharing Your Information
sections.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with third parties:

items.title: Service Providers
items.description: For hosting, analytics, and customer support.

items.title: Legal Compliance
items.description: To comply with laws or respond to lawful requests.

sections.content: We don't share your data with third parties unless required by law.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.description: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as required for legal and business purposes. Upon account deletion, data will be permanently removed from our systems, subject to legal obligations.

sections.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
sections.description: If you are located in the European Union, you have the following rights:

items.title: Access
items.description: Request a copy of your personal data.

items.title: Erasure
items.description: Request the deletion of your personal data.

items.title: Restriction
items.description: Limit the processing of your data.

items.title: Portability
items.description: Receive your data in a machine-readable format.

items.title: Objection
items.description: Object to data processing for specific purposes.

highlight.title: How to Exercise Your Right to Be Forgotten
highlight.description: To request the deletion of your personal data, please log in to the app, go to https://melmua.com/delete-account. Once you submit the request, your account and personal data will be scheduled for deletion within 30 days. If you log back into your account during this time, your deletion request will be canceled.

sections.title: Security Measures
sections.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. These include:

items.title: Encryption
items.description: Encryption of data in transit and at rest.

items.title: Access Controls
items.description: Access controls and regular security assessments.

sections.title: Updates to This Policy
sections.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The "Last updated" at the top of the policy indicates when it was last revised. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through our services.

sections.title: Contact Us

footer: By using our services, you agree to this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting Melmua Inc.
